savings_suggestions.message: In April 2025, your top 5 spending categories were: Restaurants, Gas & Fuel, Utilities, Electronics & Software, Alcohol. Consider reviewing these areas.
Among your top spending areas last month, these are often considered discretionary: Restaurants. Reducing spending here could lead to savings.
Spending in "Alcohol" increased by 25588% last month compared to the previous 3-month average (spent 184.27 vs avg 0.72).
Spending in "Utilities" increased by 566% last month compared to the previous 3-month average (spent 261.66 vs avg 39.26).
Spending in "Mortgage & Rent" increased by 266% last month compared to the previous 3-month average (spent 129.47 vs avg 35.41).
Spending in "Gas & Fuel" increased by 109% last month compared to the previous 3-month average (spent 588.85 vs avg 281.57).
